consentText: I agree to the storage and processing of my personal data (such as submitted activities and images) for the purpose of mileage logging and ranking display, in accordance with the Privacy Policy. I understand that I can withdraw my consent at any time.
consentError: Please agree to the Privacy Policy to submit.
completeSecurityCheck: To protect our systems, please complete the security verification.
submissionSuccessMessage: Your activities have been submitted successfully!
clickToUpload: Click to take photo or select file
howToAddActivities: How would you like to add your activities?
selectActivities: Select the activities you want to import
duplicateActivitiesNote: Note: Duplicate activities from imports were automatically removed.
